posts.title: Event Delegation
posts.description: After I implemented Event Delegation, I shouted
posts.details: It gave me so much issues, it was such a pain in the ass. but hurray i got past it

posts.title: Colaboration
posts.description: the great effects of collaboration in all spheres and ramifications of human life
posts.details:
the great effects of collaboration in all spheres and ramifications of human life. very important to note that together, everybody achieves more.I'm using this.parentNode as the element of a function to select the parent, and I tried both this.parent.parentNode and this.parentNode.parentNode, but both simply return the direct parent.
I'm trying to affect the div surrounding the div surrounding the 'this'. I did manage to make it work using a simple loop statement that repeats the parentNode selection twice, but I assume there's a better way.I'm using this.parentNode as the element of a function to select the parent, and I tried both this.parent.parentNode and this.parentNode.parentNode, but both simply return the direct parent.
I'm trying to affect the div surrounding the div surrounding the 'this'. I did manage to make it work using a simple loop statement that repeats the parentNode selection twice, but I assume there's a better way.
